00144   // Check usage() for command line actions associated with

00147   //   argc, argv: command line args

00156   //     of the params file used.

00163   //

00218   //
00219   // This version of load gives the programmer the option to load
00220   // up more than one class for a single application. It is a
00221   // lower-level routine than loadFromArgs, and hence more

00245   //
00246   // Loads up TDRP for a given class.
00247   //
00248   // This version of load gives the programmer the option to
00249   // load up more than one module for a single application,
00250   // using buffers which have been read from a specified source.
00251   //

00259   //     in the parameter file itself.
00260   //
00261   //   char *inbuf: the input buffer
00262   //
00263   //   int inlen: length of the input buffer
00264   //
00265   //   int start_line_num: the line number in the source which
00266   //     corresponds to the start of the buffer.
00267   //
00268   //   expand_env: flag to control environment variable
00269   //               expansion during tokenization.

00271   //               If FALSE, environment expansion is set off.
